MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-NOV-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.45am to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable outside 4 Henderson Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.35am on the 16th of November 2020.
